definitions.definition: Motion across a body of water in a craft powered by the wind , as a sport or otherwise
Navigation ; the skill needed to operate and navigate a vessel
the time of departure from a port
a scheduled voyage by a ferry or ship .

main_definition: Motion across a body of water in a craft powered by the wind , as a sport or otherwise
secondary_definitions: Navigation ; the skill needed to operate and navigate a vessel
the time of departure from a port
( countable ) a scheduled voyage by a ferry or ship .
